reviews.review_msg: This course seems easy at first but it isn't unless you're in Comp. Sci.. Ms.  Tang is a bit unorganized and will often throw you off if this is your first time seeing the material. Homework and labs will be confusing but manageable. The midterm and final is scary with questions you've never seen before. I recommend CMPT120 as a prerequisite.
Poor lecturer. reads off powerpoint does not elaborate on anything. midterms are poorly written 0/10 would never take again
Never ever take her courseWorst prof ever
